name: Tetris Game
tagline: A Tetris game created for iOS, using Apple's SpriteKit
body:
## Tetris, with a twist
Instead of making a normal tetris game like every other one on the app store, I wanted to make something abstract.. But, at the same time it was Tetris not some other game.

### You can get the code for this on github, with the buttons above, or clone it using this link:

```
$ git clone https://github.com/techsd-repo/SKTetrisGame.git
```

Feel free to make suggestions and contributions to make this game better

### Why Swift, not Objective-C
I wasn't really on the whole Swift train at first, but then I realized that the language was a lot better in my opinion.
Swift just naturally came to me, I didn't go and learn it online.


### Contact:
Twitter: @TechSd_

### Future Plans:
I hope to develop more apps, and of course I will always put them on GitHub
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
